attributes.action: give easy access to all students receiving EMA regardless of how long they have lived here instead of the present 3 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, students must have lived in the UK for three years regardless of whether they are British or EU nationals. We ask that as long as students are residents and here legally they should receive EMA especially because the PM is committed to eradicatiing child poverty.
